plugins.comment: IMPLIED by many, maybe not required

plugins.comment: disk usage monitoring with prometheus plugin

plugins.comment: Launch permanent agents via a command on the controller

plugins.comment: mailer plugin with a lot more options than 'mailer'

plugins.comment: Provides shortcuts to rebuild the last build

plugins.name: timestamper

plugins.name: warnings-ng
plugins.comment: ESSENTIAL: static code analysis, replaces findbugs plugin, etc

plugins.name: ws-cleanup
plugins.comment: Clean-up workspace, useful for all builds that do not run on dynamic build agents
